feed.title: Git-Sync Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.11.0
entry.content:
What's New ‚ùï

git-sync now supports a new config option called clone_type. By default git-sync performs a bare clone of your repository code. However with this new release, you can now specify which type of clone you want to perform.

The available options are bare, shallow, mirror or full. The default value is bare (to maintain backward compatibility).

Update your config file as mentioned in the docs to use this new feature.

Changelog

  • 9a3e9fe90b6d9c3d6c157bcaae35811ed7aaf843 feat: :sparkles: allow different clone type options

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.11.1

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.12.0
entry.content:
What's New ‚ùï

git-sync now supports Raw Git URLs. What that means is that apart from syncing your own repositories from various supported platforms, you can now also pass a list of raw git URLs as well.

With this, you can now backup and sync public repositories from other users as well üéâ

More details about the configurations and examples can be found at our Wiki.

Changelog

  • bbd98739fb8fa8318c7c27614118653c53e107d2 chore(deps): :arrow_up: upgrade go to 1.23.4
  • f4cfbac443bb40c22888fee2898ae78bbdffbc39 chore(deps): update golang docker tag to v1.23.4 (#69)
  • 003d3b230c415412911ad623f0de03bbdd49054c chore(deps): update module github.com/google/go-github/v66 to v67 (#68)
  • afc5518ced1aca17a7f6b670c8068996733732e7 chore(deps): update module github.com/google/go-github/v66 to v67 (#70)
  • 243e3e6fc3f2d5632e86d8caa8489540cd57906d chore(deps): update module github.com/xanzy/go-gitlab to v0.114.0 (#67)
  • b3f9643b54950dc5ecd03b461e83771463291906 feat: :rocket: support for raw git urls added

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.13.0
entry.content:
What's New ‚ùï

Control the number of repos being synced concurrently with the new concurrency option in the configuration. More details can be found in the Wiki.

Changelog

  • 146a29f3dea171817c993c97544ca58474446192 chore(ci): :wrench: remove sort for changelog generation
  • 130bd62548b7cf686936445894103bc25662cf7a feat: :sparkles: add concurrency support
